 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָלָה‎</span><sub>890</sub> **verb** ==go up, ascend, climb== (Late Hebrew ***id.***; [[BDB#MI|MI]]<sup>33(?)</sup>; Phoenician <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עלה‎</span>; Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***elû***</u></abbr>; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">; [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] and Syriac in derived species; compare perhaps Ethiopic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> (for <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> [[BDB#Di|Di]]<sup>54</sup>); Sabean <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עלי‎</span> = <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> [[BDB#DHM|DHM]]<sup>ZMG xxxvii. 415</sup>, compare <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עלוהו‎</span> = <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> [[BDB#SabDenkm|SabDenkm]]<sup>91</sup>); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ע‎</span> [[Gen.19.15|Gen 19:15]] +; 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָֽלְתָה‎</span> [[Gen.40.10|Gen 40:10]] +; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָלָ֑תָה‎</span> [[Jer.14.2|Jer 14:2]]; [[1Sam.1.22|1Sam 1:22]] 2 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָלִיתָ‎</span> [[Gen.49.4|Gen 49:4]] +, etc.; ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יַעֲלֶה‎</span> [[Gen.2.6|Gen 2:6]] +, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יַ֫עַל‎</span> [[Gen.44.33|Gen 44:33]] +, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיַּעַל‎</span> [[Gen.13.1|Gen 13:1]] +; suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יַעֲלֶנָּה‎</span> [[Isa.35.9|Isa 35:9]], etc.; ***Infinitive absolute*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָלֹה‎</span> [[Gen.46.4|Gen 46:4]] + 2 t.; construct <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֲלוֺת‎</span> [[Gen.32.25|Gen 32:25]] +, etc.; ***Imperative*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֲלֵה‎</span> [[Gen.35.1|Gen 35:1]] +; feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֲלִי‎</span> [[Num.21.17|Num 21:17]] +, plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֲלוּ‎</span> [[Gen.44.17|Gen 44:17]] +; ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֹלֶה‎</span> [[Gen.38.13|Gen 38:13]] +; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עוֺלֶה‎</span> [[Isa.24.18|Isa 24:18]] +, plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֹלִים‎</span> [[Gen.28.12|Gen 28:12]] +, etc.; — 

**1.** of persons, ***go up, ascend***, in local relations: 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **a.** from low place to high, with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִן‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִמִּצְרַיִם‎</span> [[Gen.45.25|Gen 45:25]] ([[BDB#E|E]]) + 6 t.; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מארץ מצרים‎</span> [[Exod.13.18|Exod 13:18]] ([[BDB#E|E]]) + 3 t.; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִבָּבֶל‎</span> [[Ezra.7.6|Ezra 7:6]]; [[Ezra.8.1|Ezra 8:1]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִן הירדן‎</span> [[Josh.4.16|Josh 4:16]]; [[Josh.4.17|Josh 4:17]]; [[Josh.4.19|Josh 4:19]] ([[BDB#P|P]]); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מ(ןהֿ)מדבר‎</span> [[Song.3.6|Song 3:6]]; [[Song.8.5|Song 8:5]] etc. 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **b.** out of a place, with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִן‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִן הארץ‎</span> [[1Sam.28.13|1Sam 28:13]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֵהַבְּאֵר‎</span> [[2Sam.17.21|2Sam 17:21]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִ(תּוֺךְ) הַפַּחַת‎</span> [[Isa.24.18|Isa 24:18]]; [[Jer.48.44|Jer 48:44]]. 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **c.** with accusative of place whither: a city <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ביתאל‎</span> [[Gen.35.1|Gen 35:1]]; [[Gen.35.3|Gen 35:3]] ([[BDB#E|E]]); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎באר שׁבע‎</span> [[Gen.26.23|Gen 26:23]] ([[BDB#J|J]]); a mountain <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ההר‎</span> [[Num.13.17|Num 13:17]] ([[BDB#J|J]][[BDB#E|E]]) [[Deut.1.24|Deut 1:24]] +, etc.; a bed [[Gen.49.4|Gen 49:4]] (twice in verse) ([[BDB#J|J]]) [[2Kgs.1.4|2Kgs 1:4]]; [[2Kgs.1.16|2Kgs 1:16]], gate [[Ruth.4.1|Ruth 4:1]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎(הַ)שָּׁמַיִם‎</span> [[Deut.30.12|Deut 30:12]]; [[2Kgs.2.11|2Kgs 2:11]]; [[Amos.9.2|Amos 9:2]] + 4 t.; with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶלֿ‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אל (ה)הר‎</span> [[Exod.19.23|Exod 19:23]]; [[Exod.34.2|Exod 34:2]]; [[Exod.34.4|Exod 34:4]] ([[BDB#J|J]]) [[Exod.24.15|Exod 24:15]]; [[Exod.24.18|Exod 24:18]] ([[BDB#P|P]]) + 5 t. [[BDB#P|P]]; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶלהַֿמָּקוֺם‎</span> [[Deut.17.8|Deut 17:8]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אל ירושׁלם‎</span> [[Ezra.7.7|Ezra 7:7]]; [[Isa.2.3|Isa 2:3]] = [[Mic.4.2|Mic 4:2]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אל הר‎</span>), with accusative of location + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶליֿ‎</span> (see **2 b**) [[Jer.31.6|Jer 31:6]], of going up to Jerusalem (from a distance), etc.; with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְ‎</span> ***to***, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לירושׁלם‎</span> [[Ezra.1.3|Ezra 1:3]] (from Babylon); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לבית‎</span> [[1Sam.25.35|1Sam 25:35]], etc.; with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַד‎</span> ***unto***, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עדנֿחל‎</span> [[Num.32.9|Num 32:9]] ([[BDB#J|J]]); with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּ‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּאַחַת עָרֵי‎</span> [[2Sam.2.1|2Sam 2:1]] (construction praegn.); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּבעל‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פרצים‎</span> [[1Chr.14.11|1Chr 14:11]] (strike out <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּ‎</span>); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּגִרָלִי‎</span> [[Judg.1.3|Judg 1:3]]. 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **d.** to sacred places, [[Exod.34.24|Exod 34:24]], with accusative <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בית יהוה‎</span>, from palace [[2Kgs.19.14|2Kgs 19:14]]; [[2Kgs.20.5|2Kgs 20:5]]; [[2Kgs.20.8|2Kgs 20:8]]; [[2Kgs.23.2|2Kgs 23:2]]; [[2Chr.29.20|2Chr 29:20]]; [[2Chr.34.30|2Chr 34:30]]; [[Isa.37.14|Isa 37:14]]; [[Isa.38.22|Isa 38:22]]; [[Jer.26.10|Jer 26:10]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎במה‎</span> [[1Sam.9.13|1Sam 9:13]]; [[1Sam.9.14|1Sam 9:14]]; [[1Sam.9.19|1Sam 9:19]] with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶל‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אל הר האלהים‎</span> [[Exod.24.13|Exod 24:13]] ([[BDB#E|E]]); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בּבית י‎</span> [[1Sam.1.7|1Sam 1:7]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בּ‎</span> dittograph); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בהר יהוה‎</span> [[Ps.24.3|Ps 24:3]]. 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **e.** with accusative <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎דֶּרֶךְ‎</span> ***by the way to*** [[Num.21.33|Num 21:33]] ([[BDB#E|E]]) [[Deut.3.1|Deut 3:1]]; [[Judg.8.11|Judg 8:11]]; [[1Sam.6.9|1Sam 6:9]]; [[2Kgs.3.8|2Kgs 3:8]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מעלה‎</span> [[Jer.48.5|Jer 48:5]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חוֺמָה‎</span> [[Joel.2.7|Joel 2:7]]. **feminine** ***ascend, climb***, with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּ‎</span> ***by***, a ladder [[Gen.28.12|Gen 28:12]] ([[BDB#E|E]]), [[Ezek.40.6|Ezek 40:6]]; [[Ezek.40.22|Ezek 40:22]]; [[Ezek.40.29|Ezek 40:29]], etc.; with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַל‎</span> ***upon***, altar by (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ב‎</span>) steps, of priest, [[Exod.20.23|Exod 20:23]] ([[BDB#Gi|Gi]]; [[BDB#van d.H.|van d. H.]] v[[Exod.20.26|Exod 20:26]] [[BDB#E|E]]) the roof [[Josh.2.8|Josh 2:8]]; [[Judg.9.51|Judg 9:51]], bed [[Ps.132.3|Ps 132:3]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַליָֿדָיו‎</span> ***on his hands*** [[1Sam.14.13|1Sam 14:13]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎על במתי עב‎</span> [[Isa.14.14|Isa 14:14]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ממעל לכוכבי אֵל‎</span>), etc. 

**2.** ***go up***, in personal relations: 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **a.** ***to meet*** or ***visit***, with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶל‎</span> person, [[Gen.44.17|Gen 44:17]]; [[Gen.44.24|Gen 44:24]]; [[Gen.44.34|Gen 44:34]]; [[Gen.45.9|Gen 45:9]] ([[BDB#J|J]]) [[Josh.10.4|Josh 10:4]]; [[Josh.10.6|Josh 10:6]] (all with implication of ***ascent***), [[Deut.25.7|Deut 25:7]] (to gate of city), +; with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎על‎</span> person, [[Gen.38.12|Gen 38:12]] (= <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ה‎</span> locative, up ***to Timnah***); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לקראת‎</span> [[Gen.46.29|Gen 46:29]] ([[BDB#J|J]]) [[Judg.6.35|Judg 6:35]]; [[2Kgs.1.3|2Kgs 1:3]]; [[2Kgs.1.6|2Kgs 1:6]]; [[2Kgs.1.7|2Kgs 1:7]]. 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **b.** ***go up*** unto (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶל‎</span>) God, on a height, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אל האלהים‎</span> [[Exod.19.3|Exod 19:3]] ([[BDB#E|E]]) [[1Sam.10.3|1Sam 10:3]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אל יהוה‎</span> [[Exod.24.1|Exod 24:1]] ([[BDB#E|E]]) [[Exod.19.24|Exod 19:24]]; [[Exod.32.30|Exod 32:30]] ([[BDB#J|J]]) [[Judg.21.5|Judg 21:5]] (twice in verse); [[Judg.21.8|Judg 21:8]] (to war); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֵלַי‎</span> [[Exod.24.12|Exod 24:12]] ([[BDB#E|E]]) [[Deut.10.1|Deut 10:1]] unto Deborah [[Judg.4.5|Judg 4:5]]. 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **c.** ***go up***, in war, with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶל‎</span> ***against*** [[Num.13.31|Num 13:31]] ([[BDB#E|E]]) [[Judg.1.1|Judg 1:1]]; [[Judg.12.3|Judg 12:3]]; [[1Sam.7.7|1Sam 7:7]]; [[Isa.36.10|Isa 36:10]] (= <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎על‎</span> [[2Kgs.18.25|2Kgs 18:25]]) +; oftener with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎על‎</span>, [[1Sam.14.10|1Sam 14:10]]; [[Judg.6.3|Judg 6:3]]; [[Judg.15.10|Judg 15:10]]; [[Judg.18.9|Judg 18:9]]; [[1Kgs.14.25|1Kgs 14:25]] +; with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎על‎</span> + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לַצָּבָא‎</span> [[Josh.22.12|Josh 22:12]]; [[Josh.22.33|Josh 22:33]] ([[BDB#P|P]]); with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּ‎</span>, [[Isa.7.6|Isa 7:6]]; [[Jer.48.18|Jer 48:18]] with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְ‎</span> [[Hab.3.16|Hab 3:16]] + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎למלחמה‎</span> [[Judg.20.18|Judg 20:18]] + 3 t.; + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎במלחמה‎</span> [[1Sam.29.9|1Sam 29:9]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַתּעל(ה) המלחמה‎</span> [[1Kgs.22.35|1Kgs 22:35]] = [[2Chr.18.34|2Chr 18:34]]. 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **d.** ***go up*** after, with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אחרי‎</span> = ***follow*** [[1Sam.25.13|1Sam 25:13]]; [[1Kgs.1.35|1Kgs 1:35]]; [[1Kgs.1.40|1Kgs 1:40]]. 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **e.** ***go up, depart***, with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֵעַל‎</span> (q. v.) [[1Sam.6.20|1Sam 6:20]]; [[Gen.17.22|Gen 17:22]]; [[Gen.35.18|Gen 35:18]] ([[BDB#P|P]]) +, subject <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כבוד י‎</span> [[Ezek.11.23|Ezek 11:23]]; [[Ezek.11.24|Ezek 11:24]] = ***withdraw, retreat***, [[1Kgs.15.19|1Kgs 15:19]]; [[2Kgs.12.19|2Kgs 12:19]]; [[Jer.21.2|Jer 21:2]], absolute [[2Sam.23.9|2Sam 23:9]], and so read \|\| [[1Chr.11.13|1Chr 11:13]] (see [[BDB#Dr|Dr]]<sup>Sm</sup>). 

**3.** of animals, ***go or come up:*** absolute frogs [[Exod.7.28|Exod 7:28]] ([[BDB#J|J]]) [[Exod.8.2|Exod 8:2]] ([[BDB#P|P]]), quails [[Exod.16.13|Exod 16:13]] ([[BDB#P|P]]); lion [[Isa.35.9|Isa 35:9]] fox [[Neh.3.25|Neh 3:25]] ***rise up, fly up***, eagle [[Isa.40.31|Isa 40:31]]; [[Jer.49.22|Jer 49:22]] with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִן‎</span>, cattle out of water [[Gen.41.2|Gen 41:2]]; [[Gen.41.3|Gen 41:3]]; [[Gen.41.18|Gen 41:18]]; [[Gen.41.19|Gen 41:19]]; [[Song.4.2|Song 4:2]]; [[Song.6.6|Song 6:6]], lion <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִגְּאוֺן הַיַּרְדֵּן‎</span> [[Jer.49.19|Jer 49:19]] = [[Jer.50.44|Jer 50:44]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִסֻּבְּכוֺ‎</span> [[Jer.4.7|Jer 4:7]], from prey [[Gen.49.9|Gen 49:9]] ([[BDB#J|J]]); ***climb up into*** (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ב‎</span>) houses, locusts [[Joel.2.9|Joel 2:9]] frogs, on (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ב‎</span>) persons [[Exod.7.29|Exod 7:29]] ([[BDB#J|J]]); with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎על‎</span>, of cattle, sexually [[Gen.31.10|Gen 31:10]]; [[Gen.31.12|Gen 31:12]] ([[BDB#E|E]]); locusts upon the land [[Exod.10.12|Exod 10:12]]; [[Exod.10.14|Exod 10:14]] ([[BDB#E|E]]) [[Joel.1.6|Joel 1:6]]. 

**4.** of vegetation, ***spring up, grow, shoot forth:*** trees [[Isa.55.13|Isa 55:13]] (twice in verse); [[Ezek.47.12|Ezek 47:12]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קיקיון‎</span> [[Jonah.4.6|Jonah 4:6]] grass [[Deut.29.22|Deut 29:22]]; [[Amos.7.1|Amos 7:1]] ears of grain [[Gen.41.5|Gen 41:5]]; [[Gen.41.22|Gen 41:22]] ([[BDB#E|E]]), also [[Gen.40.10|Gen 40:10]] ([[BDB#E|E]]) [[Isa.5.6|Isa 5:6]]; [[Isa.32.13|Isa 32:13]] compare simile [[Isa.53.2|Isa 53:2]], [[Hos.10.8|Hos 10:8]]; [[Prov.26.9|Prov 26:9]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כֻלּוֺ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ע‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קמשׂנים‎</span> [[Prov.24.31|Prov 24:31]] ***all of it grown up with thorns***, [[Isa.34.13|Isa 34:13]] figurative <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קֶרֶן‎</span> [[Dan.8.3|Dan 8:3]]; [[Dan.8.8|Dan 8:8]]. 

**5.** of natural phoenomena, ***go up, rise:*** dew, [[Exod.16.14|Exod 16:14]], i.e. disappear ([[BDB#P|P]]); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֵד ע‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִןהָֿאָרֶץ‎</span> [[Gen.2.6|Gen 2:6]] ([[BDB#J|J]]), cloud [[1Kgs.18.44|1Kgs 18:44]]; [[Jer.4.13|Jer 4:13]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַשַּׁחַר‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ע‎</span> dawn, etc. [[Gen.19.15|Gen 19:15]] ([[BDB#J|J]][[BDB#E|E]]) [[Judg.19.25|Judg 19:25]]; [[1Sam.9.26|1Sam 9:26]] +; smoke [[Gen.19.28|Gen 19:28]]; [[Exod.19.18|Exod 19:18]] ([[BDB#J|J]]) [[Judg.20.40|Judg 20:40]] +; fire [[Judg.6.21|Judg 6:21]] flame [[Judg.13.20|Judg 13:20]] stench [[Isa.34.3|Isa 34:3]]; [[Joel.2.20|Joel 2:20]] incense [[Ezek.8.11|Ezek 8:11]] well [[Num.21.17|Num 21:17]] ([[BDB#E|E]]); waters [[Jer.47.2|Jer 47:2]] Nile [[Jer.46.7|Jer 46:7]]; [[Jer.46.8|Jer 46:8]]; [[Amos.8.8|Amos 8:8]]; [[Amos.9.5|Amos 9:5]] with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎על‎</span>, of overflow [[Isa.8.7|Isa 8:7]] +. 

**6.** of inanimate things (instead of passive construction), absolute, shock of grain (to <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎גֹּרֶן‎</span>) [[Job.5.26|Job 5:26]] of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בָּשָׂר‎</span> (covering bones in Ezekiel's vision) [[Ezek.37.8|Ezek 37:8]] with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎על‎</span>, of garments upon the body [[Lev.19.19|Lev 19:19]] ([[BDB#P|P]]) [[Ezek.44.17|Ezek 44:17]] razor on head [[Judg.13.5|Judg 13:5]]; [[Judg.16.17|Judg 16:17]]; [[1Sam.1.11|1Sam 1:11]] yoke upon oxen [[Num.19.2|Num 19:2]] ([[BDB#P|P]]) [[1Sam.6.7|1Sam 6:7]] lot upon an animal [[Lev.16.9|Lev 16:9]]; [[Lev.16.10|Lev 16:10]] ([[BDB#P|P]]); with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּ‎</span>, weight in balance [[Ps.62.10|Ps 62:10]] entry in (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ב‎</span>) a book [[1Chr.27.24|1Chr 27:24]] = ***be offered*** (of sacrifice) [[1Kgs.18.29|1Kgs 18:29]]; [[2Kgs.3.20|2Kgs 3:20]]; [[Isa.60.7|Isa 60:7]]  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֲרוּכָה‎</span> (q. v.) in healing, [[Jer.8.22|Jer 8:22]], figurative [[2Chr.24.13|2Chr 24:13]]; [[Neh.4.1|Neh 4:1]]. 

**7.** of thoughts, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎על לב‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ע‎</span> [[2Kgs.12.5|2Kgs 12:5]]; [[Isa.65.17|Isa 65:17]] + 5 t.; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎על לבב‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ע‎</span> [[Jer.51.50|Jer 51:50]]; [[Ezek.38.10|Ezek 38:10]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אל לב‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ע‎</span> [[Ezek.14.7|Ezek 14:7]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎על רוּחַ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ע‎</span> [[Ezek.20.32|Ezek 20:32]] of anger [[2Sam.11.20|2Sam 11:20]]; [[2Chr.36.16|2Chr 36:16]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ב‎</span> person) + 3 t.; temper [[Eccl.10.4|Eccl 10:4]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָלֶיךָ‎</span>). 

**8.** ***come up*** before God, arrogance, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּאָזְנָיו‎</span> [[2Kgs.19.18|2Kgs 19:18]] = [[Isa.37.29|Isa 37:29]] cry, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶלאֿ‎</span> [[Exod.2.23|Exod 2:23]] ([[BDB#P|P]]), with accusative [[1Sam.5.12|1Sam 5:12]], absolute [[Jer.14.2|Jer 14:2]] tumult [[Ps.74.23|Ps 74:23]] of evil [[Jonah.1.2|Jonah 1:2]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְפָנַי‎</span>). 

**9.** ***go up, extend***, of boundary, with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִן‎</span> ***whence***, + accusative, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶל‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְ‎</span> and even <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְ‎</span> ***whither*** [[Josh.15.3|Josh 15:3]]; [[Josh.15.6|Josh 15:6]]; [[Josh.15.8|Josh 15:8]]; [[Josh.18.12|Josh 18:12]] (twice in verse) + (all [[BDB#P|P]]). 10. ***excel: thou excellest*** (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַל‎</span>) ***them*** [[Prov.31.29|Prov 31:29]] ***be superior to*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יעלה עליך מעלה מעלה‎</span> [[Deut.28.43|Deut 28:43]]. — <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עוֺלֶה‎</span> [[Job.36.33|Job 36:33]] is difficult, compare Comm., and see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַוְלָה‎</span>). **Niph\`al** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נַעֲלָה‎</span> [[Num.10.11|Num 10:11]] +; 2 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נַעֲלֵיתָ‎</span> [[Ps.97.9|Ps 97:9]] ***Imperfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יֵעָלֶה‎</span> [[Exod.40.37|Exod 40:37]], etc.; ***Infinitive construct*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הֵעָלוֺת‎</span> [[Num.9.17|Num 9:17]] +, etc.; ***Imperative*** masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הֵעָלוּ‎</span> [[Num.16.24|Num 16:24]] — 

**1. a.** ***be brought up:*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מבבל לירושׁלם‎</span> [[Ezra.1.11|Ezra 1:11]]. 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **b.** ***be taken up***, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַתֵּעֲלוּ על שׂפת לשׁון‎</span> [[Ezek.36.3|Ezek 36:3]] ([[BDB#Kö|Kö]]<sup>i. 553</sup>; talked about). 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **c.** (1) passive, ***be taken up, away***, of (pillar of) cloud, followed by <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֵעַל‎</span> of tabernacle [[Exod.40.36|Exod 40:36]]; [[Num.9.17|Num 9:17]]; [[Num.10.11|Num 10:11]] ([[BDB#P|P]]); absolute [[Exod.40.37|Exod 40:37]] (twice in verse); [[Num.9.21|Num 9:21]] (twice in verse); [[Num.9.22|Num 9:22]] ([[BDB#P|P]]); of the glory from upon the cherubim [[Ezek.9.3|Ezek 9:3]] (2) reflexive, ***take oneself away from, get up from:*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִסָּבִיבֹ‎</span> [[Num.16.24|Num 16:24]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֵעַל‎</span> v[[Num.16.27|Num 16:27]] of a besieging army [[Jer.37.5|Jer 37:5]]; [[Jer.37.11|Jer 37:11]]. 

**2.** reflexive: ***take oneself away*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מאחרי‎</span> person, from following after, [[2Sam.2.27|2Sam 2:27]]. 

**3.** ***be exalted***, of God [[Ps.47.10|Ps 47:10]] with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎על‎</span>, ***over*** all gods [[Ps.97.9|Ps 97:9]].

**Hiph\`il** ***Perfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הֶעֱלָךְ‎</span> [[Num.8.3|Num 8:3]] +, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הֵעֲלָה‎</span> [[Hab.1.15|Hab 1:15]] ([[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>«GKC:63p»§ 63p</sup>); suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הֶעֶלְךָ‎</span> [[Neh.9.18|Neh 9:18]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הֶעֱלָנוּ‎</span> [[Exod.32.1|Exod 32:1]] + 2 t.; 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְהַעַלְתָה‎</span> [[1Sam.2.19|1Sam 2:19]] consecutive; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הֶעֱלֵיתָ‎</span> [[Exod.32.7|Exod 32:7]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְהַעֲלֵיתָ‎</span> consecutive [[Exod.40.4|Exod 40:4]] 2 masculine plural suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הֶעֱלִיתֻנוּ‎</span> [[Num.20.5|Num 20:5]]; [[Num.21.5|Num 21:5]], etc.; ***Imperfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יַעֲלֶה‎</span> [[Lev.17.8|Lev 17:8]] +; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְיַ֫עַל‎</span> [[2Sam.24.22|2Sam 24:22]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיַּעֲלֶה‎</span> [[Jer.10.13|Jer 10:13]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיַּ֫עַל‎</span> [[Gen.8.20|Gen 8:20]] +, suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יַעְלֵם‎</span> [[Deut.28.61|Deut 28:61]], etc.; ***Infinitive absolute*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַעֲלֵה‎</span> [[Ezek.23.46|Ezek 23:46]] construct <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַעֲלוֺת‎</span> [[1Chr.23.31|1Chr 23:31]] +, etc.; ***Imperative*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַ֫עַל‎</span> [[Exod.33.12|Exod 33:12]] + 2 t.; feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַעֲלִי‎</span> [[1Sam.28.8|1Sam 28:8]]; [[1Sam.28.11|1Sam 28:11]] +, etc.; ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַעֲלֶה‎</span> [[1Sam.7.10|1Sam 7:10]] +; construct <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַעֲלֵה‎</span> [[Lev.11.4|Lev 11:4]] +; suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַעַלְךָ‎</span> [[Deut.20.1|Deut 20:1]]; [[Ps.81.11|Ps 81:11]] feminine <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַעֲלָה‎</span> [[Lev.11.26|Lev 11:26]] construct <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַעֲלַת‎</span> [[Lev.11.3|Lev 11:3]]; [[Lev.11.6|Lev 11:6]]; [[Deut.14.6|Deut 14:6]], etc.; — 

**1.** ***bring up*** persons: 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **a.** from a place, with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִן ׃מִן‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַסָּ֑לַע‎</span> [[Judg.15.13|Judg 15:13]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִמִּצְרַיִם‎</span> [[Exod.17.3|Exod 17:3]] ([[BDB#E|E]]) + 3 t. [[BDB#E|E]], + 8 t.; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מארץ מצרים‎</span> [[Exod.32.1|Exod 32:1]] ([[BDB#J|J]]) + 5 t. [[BDB#J|J]], + [[Lev.11.45|Lev 11:45]] ([[BDB#P|P]]), [[Deut.20.1|Deut 20:1]]; [[Josh.24.17|Josh 24:17]] ([[BDB#E|E]]), + 13 t.; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מארץ צפון‎</span> [[Jer.16.15|Jer 16:15]] = [[Jer.23.8|Jer 23:8]]. 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **b.** (1) out of a place, with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׃מן‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִ(ן הַ)בּוֺר‎</span> [[Gen.37.28|Gen 37:28]] ([[BDB#E|E]]) [[Ps.40.3|Ps 40:3]]; [[Jer.38.10|Jer 38:10]]; [[Jer.38.13|Jer 38:13]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎משּׁחת‎</span> [[Jonah.2.7|Jonah 2:7]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מקּברות‎</span> [[Ezek.37.12|Ezek 37:12]]; [[Ezek.37.13|Ezek 37:13]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מןשֿׁאול‎</span> [[Ps.30.4|Ps 30:4]], etc.; (2) with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּ‎</span> ***by means of***, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּחֶרְמִי‎</span> [[Ezek.32.3|Ezek 32:3]] ([[Hab.1.15|Hab 1:15]] see **3** below). 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **c.** with accusative of place whither, [[Num.20.25|Num 20:25]] ([[BDB#P|P]]) [[Num.22.41|Num 22:41]] ([[BDB#E|E]]) [[Josh.2.6|Josh 2:6]]; [[Josh.7.24|Josh 7:24]] ([[BDB#J|J]]) [[Ezra.4.2|Ezra 4:2]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎השׁמים‎</span> [[2Kgs.2.1|2Kgs 2:1]] with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶלהָֿעֲלִיָּה ׃אֶל‎</span> [[1Kgs.17.19|1Kgs 17:19]] with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לבית ׃לְ‎</span> [[2Chr.8.11|2Chr 8:11]]. 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **d.** ***cause to ascend, climb:*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎על המרכבה‎</span> [[1Kgs.20.33|1Kgs 20:33]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶל‎</span> [[2Kgs.10.15|2Kgs 10:15]] probably error), <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עלהֿמגדלות‎</span> [[2Chr.32.5|2Chr 32:5]] ([[BDB#Vg|ᵑ9]] ***built towers thereon***, i.e. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָלָיו‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ע‎</span>); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֵעַל להומה‎</span> [[Neh.12.31|Neh 12:31]] see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎על‎</span> **IV 2 e.** 

**2.** in personal relations: 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **a.** ***bring up***, with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אל‎</span>, [[1Sam.19.15|1Sam 19:15]]; [[2Kgs.10.15|2Kgs 10:15]]; [[2Kgs.25.6|2Kgs 25:6]]; [[Jer.39.5|Jer 39:5]]; [[Jer.52.9|Jer 52:9]] with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְ‎</span> [[1Sam.28.8|1Sam 28:8]]; [[1Sam.28.11|1Sam 28:11]] (twice in verse). 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **b.** in war, with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַל‎</span> ***against*** [[2Chr.36.17|2Chr 36:17]]; [[Jer.50.9|Jer 50:9]]; [[Ezek.16.40|Ezek 16:40]]; [[Ezek.23.46|Ezek 23:46]]; [[Ezek.26.3|Ezek 26:3]]. 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **c.** ***take away*** (from life) [[Ps.102.25|Ps 102:25]]; [[Job.36.20|Job 36:20]]. 

**3.** ***bring up*** animals, with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎על‎</span>, frogs <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎על הארץ‎</span> [[Exod.8.1|Exod 8:1]]; [[Exod.8.3|Exod 8:3]] ([[BDB#P|P]]); ***bring up*** horses to a charge [[Jer.51.27|Jer 51:27]], compare [[Nah.3.3|Nah 3:3]] ***draw up men***, under figure of fish (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּחַכָּה‎</span>) [[Hab.1.15|Hab 1:15]] ***train***, young lion [[Ezek.19.3|Ezek 19:3]] of cattle, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מעלה גֵרָה‎</span>, i.e. ***chewing the cud*** [[Lev.11.3|Lev 11:3]]; [[Lev.11.4|Lev 11:4]] (twice in verse); [[Lev.11.5|Lev 11:5]]; [[Lev.11.6|Lev 11:6]]; [[Lev.11.26|Lev 11:26]]; [[Deut.14.6|Deut 14:6]]; [[Deut.14.7|Deut 14:7]] (twice in verse).

[[Num.23.14|Num 23:14]]; [[Num.23.30|Num 23:30]] ([[BDB#E|E]]); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עלהַֿחֹמָה‎</span> [[2Kgs.3.27|2Kgs 3:27]] usually <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎על‎</span> location, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎על הַצּוּר‎</span> [[Judg.13.19|Judg 13:19]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎על מזבח‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הע‎</span> [[1Kgs.12.32|1Kgs 12:32]]; [[1Kgs.12.33|1Kgs 12:33]] (twice in verse); [[2Kgs.16.12|2Kgs 16:12]]; [[2Chr.1.6|2Chr 1:6]]; [[2Chr.29.21|2Chr 29:21]]; [[1Sam.2.28|1Sam 2:28]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פרים על‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מזבח‎</span> [[Ps.51.21|Ps 51:21]] elsewhere <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עלות על מזבח‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חע‎</span> [[Exod.40.29|Exod 40:29]] ([[BDB#P|P]]) [[Josh.22.23|Josh 22:23]]; [[1Kgs.3.4|1Kgs 3:4]]; [[1Kgs.9.25|1Kgs 9:25]]; [[2Chr.1.6|2Chr 1:6]]; [[2Chr.35.16|2Chr 35:16]]; [[Ezra.3.2|Ezra 3:2]]; [[Ezek.43.18|Ezek 43:18]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עלות ליהוה על מז‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הע‎</span> [[Deut.27.6|Deut 27:6]]; [[Josh.8.31|Josh 8:31]]; [[1Chr.16.40|1Chr 16:40]]; [[2Chr.8.12|2Chr 8:12]]; [[Ezra.3.3|Ezra 3:3]]. **Hoph\`al** ***Perfect***;.; — 

**1.** ***be carried away***, 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הֹעֲלָ֑תָךְ‎</span> [[Nah.2.8|Nah 2:8]]. 

**2.** ***be taken up*** into, ***inserted*** in, 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הֹעֲלָה‎</span> [[2Chr.20.34|2Chr 20:34]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎על ספר‎</span>) (passive of **Qal 6**). 

**3.** 3 masculine singular ***be offered***, of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פר‎</span> [[Judg.6.28|Judg 6:28]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎על המזבח‎</span>). **Hithpa\`el** ***lift oneself: Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶליִֿתְעַל‎</span> [[Jer.51.3|Jer 51:3]] ***against*** (him that) ***lifts himself***, but corrupt; either read <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אַלֿ‎</span>, ***let him not***, etc. ([[BDB#Syr|ᵑ6]] [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] [[BDB#Vg|ᵑ9]] [[BDB#Hi|Hi]] [[BDB#Gf|Gf]] [[BDB#Gie|Gie]] [[BDB#Rothst|Rothst]]), or strike out <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אל‎</span> ([[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] [[BDB#Co|Co]]<sup>Hpt</sup>.). 



 <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎עלה‎</span> (√of following; see Biblical Hebrew  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָלָה‎</span>).
